attributes.action: Make the immigration laws more strict in the UK to allow more local jobs.
attributes.background: We want to make the laws more strict on immigration so that local citizens can get jobs in their community rather than commuting to other places to get a job.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for a specific change to immigration law.
